title: EXIM's Hochberg: Shelby EXIM Block Is Jeopardizing Jobs (Audio)
itunes:title: EXIM's Hochberg: Shelby EXIM Block Is Jeopardizing Jobs (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Fred Hochberg, Chairman and President of the Export-Import Bank of the United States (EXIM Bank), on their new competitiveness report, Brexit, and EXIM's 1 year anniversary since the lapse.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
